The I am using the 5.2.3 zend debugger with PHP 5 and the debugger is not stopping on breakpoints.  There is an endless spew of errors and stack traces in the logs with a similar message.  I believe the true error may be a parse error from the Zend extension (for breakpoint messages from the debugger), perhaps having something to do with Mac OS X.  Also, the file name in the eventual exception message has the first 2 characters missing.  Another note, this is an Intel MAC.

notification from the server and then when trying to obtain the resource we had 
a crash.
To speed up the process, can you supply us a project zip and steps to reproduce?

Please upgrade your Zend debugger and PDT.
The minimal required debugger version is 5.2.6.

If you are still having these issues, please reopen and supply us with a 
project that caused them.
Thanks!
